name: Live?Twin Sunny's Snitch
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Live?Twin" monster from your Deck to your hand. While you control an "Evil?Twin" monster, each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), you gain 200 LP, and if you do, inflict 200 damage to your opponent. You can only activate 1 "Live?Twin Sunny's Snitch" per turn.
